description:
Kappei is a dramatically short guy but he is a master in every sport. Abandoned by his parents and grandfather, Kappei goes to Tokyo and becomes a star basketball.
He lives as a guest in sweet Akane`s house, and he`s in love with her, but there`s a strange rival, her dog Seiichirou who plans evil traps to encumber Kappei. Kappei is fond of white female underwear, always trying to lift girl`skirts up. He likes being the center of attention and is much admired by the girls.
name: Sakamoto Kappei
